column1: There's a new version of [pytest-cov](https://pypi.python.org/pypi/pytest-cov) available.
You are currently using **2.4.0**. I have updated it to **2.5.1**
These links might come in handy: PyPI | Changelog | Repo
>* Always show a summary when ``--cov-fail-under`` is used. Contributed by Francis Niu in `PR141
>* Improve exception handling in subprocess setup. Fixes `144 &lt
>* Fixed handling when ``--cov`` is used multiple times. Fixes `151 &lt
*Got merge conflicts? Close this PR and delete the branch. I'll create a new PR for you.*
